newsitem.title: UK: Brixton Est sees industrial property rise.
newsitem.headline: Brixton Est sees industrial property rise.

text.p: British property company Brixton Estate Plc said on Thursday the recovery in the British industrial property sector was now well established.
The group, which is refocusing its portfolio by moving out of offices and overseas markets and concentrating on industrial and warehouse sectors, said it was confident of making progress in 1997.
Brixton reported a 2.8 percent increase in pre-tax profits to 36.12 million stg from 35.14 million in 1995 but its net asset value (NAV) per share fell to 181 pence from 188 pence the previous year.
